page.title: 10Roads in Plympton St. Mary.
page.content: The whole area is dominated by the {A.38}which bisects it horizontally. But the surrounding countryside is criss-crossed with smaller roads.These of course are minor roads and as such may only be{just one car width}in places.This can lead to annoying reversing which can be dangerous especially as the roads are of a {twisty nature.}This procedure can be even more hazardous due to the lush vegetation growing along the edges preventing easy viewing of vehicles. These roads are generally well sign- posted and this year new signs proclaiming{"Leisure Drive"}have already brought cries of concern with the possibility of increased tourist traffic bringing drivers who are unused to these small lanes into the area.
